display_long_description:
Welcome to...

**🔥NEOLITHIC DAWN - EARLY ACCESS!🔥**

The ultimate primitive survival experience! Step into the shoes of a Neolithic hunter-gatherer and struggle to survive in a harsh and unforgiving world.  

If you die in Neolithic Dawn, you come back as your son or daughter a generation later to a version of the world that has been permanently altered by time. Experience a real-time day night cycle, dynamic seasons, and generational changes as you explore 5 large open world maps each with its own unique dungeon to explore.


**🪓 Physics-Based Crafting**

Create whatever you can out of what you find. Anything you can imagine is possible when you build stone tools with your own two hands, the true caveman way.
[media]

**🐺 Tame Anything**

Any animal you see may become a powerful ally in the wilderness, provided you have the strength to impress them and the ingenuity to live alongside them
[media]

**👯‍♂️ Up to 4 Player CO-OP**

Even more fun when you bring your friends and face the wilderness together!

Neolithic Dawn is built by a small team with a big dream. By launching in Early Access we hope to finish building the game alongside the community so we can build the greatest VR survival game together! 💪

Welcome to...

**🔥NEOLITHIC DAWN - EARLY ACCESS!🔥**

The ultimate primitive survival experience! Step into the shoes of a Neolithic hunter-gatherer and struggle to survive in a harsh and unforgiving world.  

If you die in Neolithic Dawn, you come back as your son or daughter a generation later to a version of the world that has been permanently altered by time. Experience a real-time day night cycle, dynamic seasons, and generational changes as you explore 5 large open world maps each with its own unique dungeon to explore.


**🪓 Physics-Based Crafting**

Create whatever you can out of what you find. Anything you can imagine is possible when you build stone tools with your own two hands, the true caveman way.

**🐺 Tame Anything**

Any animal you see may become a powerful ally in the wilderness, provided you have the strength to impress them and the ingenuity to live alongside them
![{"height":360,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-lga3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499294704_1273260987837499_2588513905724947595_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wvTESvjV8hUQ7kNvwH114zW&_nc_oc=AdkLDILshbyxl5MsAZxJv6XqXsetxzqixBvxz9f1aK5rMVaMvkTtm1m2GXiyjQz17tU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-lga3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=MpKxwLUSo4Okuj8jwGjRpQ&oh=00_AffQ7XQWcFyMrM-ldhyTdhbA_AODZUTCZdzmbqFcsCUKUA&oe=68F4349B)

Even more fun when you bring your friends and face the wilderness together!

Neolithic Dawn is built by a small team with a big dream. By launching in Early Access we hope to finish building the game alongside the community so we can build the greatest VR survival game together! 💪
